definition: to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Finally, the provision of quality services, that is, three packs of policy.
sentences.chinese: 最后，提供优质服务，即三包政策。

sentences.english: Mr. Lee consumes three packs of cigarettes a day; he surely smokes like a chimney.
sentences.chinese: 李先生一天抽三包烟，他真是像个烟囟。

sentences.english: Julie bought milk and three packets of soup mix.
sentences.chinese: 茱莉买了牛奶和三包调理汤包。

sentences.english: Kevin returns to the store and buys three packages of American-grown pine nuts.
sentences.chinese: 凯文返回商店买了三包美国松仁。

sentences.english: Products are sold to provide the 18-month period of three bags, life-long follow-up service.
sentences.chinese: 所售产品均提供18个月的三包期，终身跟踪服务。

sentences.english: It can be repaired, exchanged and returned repaired in a year if the product with quality problems.
sentences.chinese: 我公司产品如有质量问题，一年内实行三包。

sentences.english: Article 3 The products incorporated into the Catalogue shall be subject to the principle of "three guarantees", namely, whoever sells the products should take the charge.
sentences.chinese: 第三条列入目录的产品实行谁经销谁负责三包的原则。

sentences.english: The warranty period starts form the invoice date. If the customer loses the invoice, it starts from the manufacturing date.
sentences.chinese: 用户遗失购买发票时，应按出厂日期推算三包有效期。

sentences.english: The warranty period for free repair, the implementation of national Three Guarantees policy.
sentences.chinese: 质保期内免费维修，实行国家三包政策。

sentences.english: Product certification is complete, safe and reliable, the quality of three bags.
sentences.chinese: 产品认证齐全，安全可靠，质量三包。

sentences.english: He became so addicted that he would smoke up to three packs of Marlboros a day.
sentences.chinese: 他变得非常沉迷，每天要抽三包万宝路。

definition: to guarantee refund (for faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to guarantee refund or replacement (of faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to return a product for another item
lit. if one is fake, I shall compensate you for ten of them/fig. (of goods) 100% genuine
to have the full responsibility of a job/allocated task
date of use (on foodstuffs)/best before date
